greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of 2n in which any two distinct parts differ by at least n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
mathematica: a[n_] := a[n] = DivisorSigma[0, 2n] + Sum[g[2n - j, Min[2n - j, j - n]], {j, n + 1, 2n - 1}]; a[0] = 1;
a /@ Range[0, 100] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 12 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 27 2018
